title: Seek advice
content:
Talk to your parents or guardians. Or your senior woman teacher if you have any challenges. You can also visit your nearest youth centre and ask for the counselor for advice. For more information SMS to 6300.

[Let’s Talk][1]

[Sexuality Facts][2]
